title: Future Learning Preparation and Self-Regulated Learning-Based Language Education Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Online real-time instruction accessible via smartphones for current secondary school teachers, with formative assessment-driven feedback-centered learning design.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and resolve at least two new language education problems using self-regulated learning strategies
Learners can creatively apply three new teaching methods in real educational scenarios using the Preparing for Future Learning (PFL) framework
Learners can improve language lesson design capabilities by over 20% through peer feedback and self-assessment (based on formative evaluation standards)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
